LanguageData.Axi_S_VEPR12_21CA.label: VEPR-12
LanguageData.Axi_S_VEPR12_21CA.description: Originally designed as an under-barrel attachment for assault rifles, the M26 was found to perform more optimally in a standalone configuration with a pistol grip and traditional stock. This example of the weapon features these attachments in a permenently-attached fashion.
LanguageData.Axi_S_VEPR12_21CA.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Axi_S_VEPR12_21CA.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Axi_S_VEPR12_21CA.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: VEPR-12
